PHRASE.LANG: This bundle contains the Old Sofa RaceOn, the Car Seat RaceOn, the ToolBox Small RaceOn, the ToolBox Big RaceOn and the Tyre Changer RaceOn.[#Legal]
Ce paquet contient Vieux canapé RaceOn, Siège d'auto RaceOn, Petite boîte à outils RaceOn, Grand boîte à outils RaceOn et Changeur de pneus RaceOn. [#Legal]
Dieses Bundle enthält Alten Sofa RaceOn, Autositz RaceOn, Kleines Werkzeugkasten RaceOn, Groß Werkzeugkasten RaceOn und Reifenmontiermaschine RaceOn. [#Legal]
Questo pacchetto contiene Vecchio Divano RaceOn, Seggiolino Auto RaceOn, Cassetta degli Attrezzi Piccolo RaceOn, Cassetta degli Attrezzi Grande RaceOn e Smontagomme RaceOn. [#Legal]
Este paquete contiene el Sofa Viejo RaceOn, el Asiento de Auto RaceOn, la Caja de Herramientas RaceOn, Caja de Herramientas Grande RaceOn y el Cambiador de Neumaticos RaceOn. [#Legal]
This bundle contains the Old Sofa RaceOn, the Car Seat RaceOn, the ToolBox Small RaceOn, the ToolBox Big RaceOn and the Tyre Changer RaceOn. [#Legal]
